description:
This collections holds locations data for hydrated mineral terrains, Central peaks hydrated phases between Isidis
and Hellas, Central peaks mineralogy south Valles Marineris, Valles Marineris low Calcium-Pyroxene, Seasonal South
polar cap limits, Scalloped depressions and Lobate impact craters. This dataset contains vector catalogs
and their associated metadatas. All catalogs are provided in GeoJSON file format.

links.title: IAS Planetary Surface Data STAC Catalog

title: Mars Surface Features Location Datasets

providers.name: Institut d'Astrophysique Spatiale (IAS) - IDOC
providers.description:
The Integrated Data and Operation Center (IDOC) is responsible for processing, archiving
and distributing data from space science missions in which the IAS institute is involved.

providers.name: Géosciences Paris-Saclay (GEOPS)
providers.description:
GEOPS is a joint laboratory of the “Université de Paris-Sud” (UPSUD) and the "Centre National
de la Recherche Scientifique" (CNRS).

providers.name: Planetary SUrface Portal (PSUP)
providers.description:
PSUP is a french research service, by Observatoire Paris-Sud and Observatoire de Lyon, to help
the distribution of high added-value datasets of planetary surfaces.
